definition: desperate straits
to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means
variant of 絕|绝[jue2]
border/place/condition/boundary/circumstances/territory

sentences.english: Just like a sea dragon having to fight on land, it will face with difficulties.
sentences.chinese: 就好像龙离开大海到陆地作战而面临绝境一样。

sentences.english: These passions , in a wayward course, over a deep ocean of anguish, reaching to the very verge of despair.
sentences.chinese: 这些激情像飓风，反复地深重的苦海，濒于绝境。

sentences.english: U. S. winner Ms. Moore got teary on the brink of elimination ─ Ms.
sentences.chinese: 美国冠军摩尔曾一度濒临绝境而泪流满面。

sentences.english: The chess-player conceded the game when he saw that his position was hopeless.
sentences.chinese: 棋手一看出自己陷入绝境，就承认那局棋输了。

sentences.english: We were on the precipice of a global financial crisis one year ago.
sentences.chinese: 一年之前，我们还处在全球金融危机的绝境边缘。

sentences.english: Unemployment and the death of his youngest daughter nearly drove him into hopeless situation.
sentences.chinese: 失业加上他的小女儿的死亡几乎把他逼进绝境。

sentences.english: You may be in deep despair, deep trouble, under deep stress.
sentences.chinese: 你可能深陷于绝境，困难重重，压力很大。

sentences.english: We software developers have a tendency to create dead-end acronyms.
sentences.chinese: 我们这些软件开发者往往倾向于创造“绝境”缩写词。

sentences.english: How did a family that once owned so much find itself in such a corner?
sentences.chinese: 这样一个一度富可敌国的家族为何陷入如此绝境？

sentences.english: Ishi Tib are ferocious fighters, especially when cornered.
sentences.chinese: 伊希提卜人是蛮烈的斗士，处于绝境时尤其如此。

sentences.english: In an ugly replay of the weekend before, Bear Stearns was imperiled again.
sentences.chinese: 和上周末一样，贝尔斯登再次陷入绝境。

sentences.english: Picasso died, installers cover g life almost in an impasse.
sentences.chinese: 毕加索过世以后，安装工盖内克的生活几乎陷于绝境。

sentences.english: His incompetence have bring us to the brink of ruin.
sentences.chinese: 他很无能已导致我们濒临绝境。

sentences.english: They have come to believe in the one true God and Savior, the way from despair to delight.
sentences.chinese: 他们相信那位独一真神和救主，从绝境进入喜乐之境。

sentences.english: If I spilt my guts, it would make a mess we can't clean up.
sentences.chinese: 对你掏心掏肺，只会让这一切更糟，陷入绝境。

definition: critical circumstances/risky conditions/danger zone
lit. the path exhausted, the end of the road (idiom); an impasse/in a plight with no way out/things have reached a dead end
dangerous situation/venerable old age
the critical moment/life and death crisis
mountain and river exhausted (idiom); at the end of the line/nowhere to go
to be at an impasse (idiom)/in a tight spot/at the end of one's rope/desperate
adversity/predicament
without a retreat route/caught in a dead end/having burned one's bridges
predicament/plight
to despair/to give up all hope/desperate/desperation
to come back from death's door (idiom); unexpected rescue from danger/fig. to recover from a seemingly impossible situation/to find a way out of a predicament
circumstances
lit. fight with one's back to the river (idiom); fig. to fight to win or die
calamity
perilous situation
a cornered beast will still fight (idiom)/to fight like an animal at bay
